comment.title: Take off
comment.desc: Ask the drone to take off.\n On the fixed wings (such as Disco): not used except to cancel a land.
comment.result: On the quadcopters: the drone takes off if its [FlyingState](#1-4-1) was landed.\n On the fixed wings, the landing process is aborted if the [FlyingState](#1-4-1) was landing.\n Then, event [FlyingState](#1-4-1) is triggered.
